verses.text: As a north wind brings rain, so a sly tongue brings angry looks.

rsbNotes.title: Pr 25:23
rsbNotes.text: 25:23 Note the inevitable cause and effect relationship expressed in both lines.

verses.text: Better to live on a corner of the roof than share a house with a quarrelsome wife.

rsbNotes.title: Pr 25:24
rsbNotes.text: 25:24 See 21:9 and note.
